p: Table 6 shows the influences of supplementing oregano essential oil to a reduced-protein diet on plasma TBARS concentrations and plasma antioxidant enzymes activity. In plasma, the levels of TBARS and CAT were unaffected ( p > 0.05) by dietary treatments. Pigs fed with RPO exhibited the highest activities of T-AOC, T-SOD, and GPx than pigs fed with the NPD, RPD, and RPA ( p < 0.05).
